import { createMedia } from '@artsy/fresnel' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import React, { useState,useEffect } from 'react' import {StyledForm} from '../StyledComponent' import axios from 'axios' import { Button, Container, Grid, Header, Icon, Image, List, Menu, Form, Input, Segment, Sidebar, Visibility,Divider, Dropdown } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { Link, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' const { MediaContextProvider, Media } = createMedia({ breakpoints: { mobile: 0, tablet: 768, computer: 1024, }, }) const HomepageHeading = ({ mobile }) => (
) HomepageHeading.propTypes = { mobile: PropTypes.bool, } const DesktopContainer=({children})=>{ const [fixed,toggleFixedBar] = useState(false) const showNav =()=>{ toggleFixedBar(true) } const hideNav =()=>{ toggleFixedBar(false) } const history = useHistory() const [activeItem,setActiveItem] = useState({ name:'home' }) const handleItemClick =(e,{name})=>{ setActiveItem(name) } return ( {children} ) } DesktopContainer.propTypes = { children: PropTypes.node, } const MobileContainer =({children})=>{ const [sidebarOpened, setOpenedSideBar] = useState(false) /* thsi is a handler for sidebar toggler */ const handleSidebarHide = () => { setOpenedSideBar(false) } const handleToggle = () =>{ setOpenedSideBar(true) } return ( Home Work Company Careers Log in Sign Up {children} ) } MobileContainer.propTypes = { children: PropTypes.node, } const ResponsiveContainer = ({ children }) => ( /* Heads up! * For large applications it may not be best option to put all page into these containers at * they will be rendered twice for SSR. */ {children} {children} ) ResponsiveContainer.propTypes = { children: PropTypes.node, } const Home = () => { const [multipleFiles, setMultipleFiles] = useState([]); const getMultipleFiles = async () => { try{ const {data} = await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/getMultipleFiles'); return data; }catch(error){ throw error; } } const getMultipleFilesList = async () => { try { const fileslist = await getMultipleFiles(); setMultipleFiles(fileslist); } catch (error) { console.log(error); } } useEffect(() => { getMultipleFilesList() // eslint-disable-next-line react-hooks/exhaustive-deps }, []); return( FOR RENTERS
